message: Just want to say hello, I am a designer and entreating from Atlanta, Georgia originally.  I now live in Cincinnati, Ohio, and right now I am loving life!  Wasn't always that way though.  I just started my own business 60 days ago, and things are going quite well.   You  can check it out on-line it is called Megabotix.  Also, I have an independent record I produced called Bent Ascent - King of Hearts --> http://indiadamjones.bandcamp.com
